material: Ethylene Propylene Diene Monomer (EPDM) Roofing Membrane
description: Ethylene propylene diene monomer (EPDM) is a synthetic rubber roofing membrane derived from oil and natural gas. EPDM is an M-Class rubber under ASTM standard D-1418.
short desc: EPDM is a synthetic rubber roofing membrane most commonly used in low-slope buildings
source: Samples cut from a 6 mm thick roll.
